description_for_human: The Meta-Operating System for your business. Orchestrates specialized AI agents (Bees) to automate workflows, analyze data, and generate creative content.
description_for_model: Colony OS is a multi-agent orchestration platform. Use it to delegate complex tasks to specialized sub-agents ('Bees'). You can dispatch tasks, check status, and retrieve memories. Capabilities include: Document analysis (DocBee), Code generation (CodeBee), and Semantic Structuring (Mind).
conversation_starters: Dispatch a new task to the Hive
What is the status of my active agents?
Analyze this text using the Sensory Cortex
Run a Mind Structure analysis on this idea

sensory_pulse.description: Analyze raw text for sentiment, category, and urgency.

mind_structure.description: Convert linear text into a 3D semantic graph of concepts.

memory_recall.description: Retrieve past knowledge from the Honeycomb.
